title: Please identify this font face - its at least 10 years old
content:
Trying to find out this old-ish typeface, anyone?

author: francisthedesigner

comments.content:
Identifying it is easy. Just post your request in the correct forum -- not here.  
Post it here --\>\> [Type ID](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803033702/http:/www.typophile.com/typeid)
Right, sorry I am new to the forum will move it now :)
